summary: Completed mobile UI testing for Acetaminophen Nomogram and Acute Weakness flowchart scrolling features. All 6 test cases PASSED on mobile viewport (390x844).
passed_tests: Acetaminophen Rumack-Matthew nomogram chart is scrollable on mobile (390x844 viewport) - container has overflow-auto with minWidth: 340px
Acetaminophen shows '← Swipe to scroll →' hint on mobile - visible with display:block, dimensions 272x20px
Full nomogram chart (320x280px SVG) is visible when scrolling - shows Y-axis (5-200 mcg/mL) and X-axis (4h-24h) with Treatment and Probable toxicity lines
Acute Weakness flowchart has horizontal scroll on mobile - container width 520px, parent width 306px, scrollable 230px
Acute Weakness shows '← Swipe to scroll →' hint on mobile - visible with display:block, dimensions 290x13.5px
Acute Weakness flowchart text is NOT wrapped to 2 lines when scrolled - all columns (History/Examination, Investigations, Neuro Location) display properly
critical_code_review_comments: AcetaminophenApproach.jsx (line 487): sm:hidden class correctly shows swipe hint only on mobile (<640px)
AcetaminophenApproach.jsx (lines 488-542): Scrollable container with overflow-auto and minWidth: 340px works correctly
WeaknessApproach.jsx (line 24): sm:hidden class correctly shows swipe hint only on mobile
WeaknessApproach.jsx (line 27): min-w-[520px] forces horizontal scroll on narrow screens - working as expected
Both components use proper responsive design patterns for mobile scrolling
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile UI scrolling features verified: 1) Acetaminophen Rumack-Matthew Nomogram has scrollable container (overflow-auto, minWidth: 340px) with '← Swipe to scroll →' hint visible on mobile via sm:hidden class. SVG chart is 320x280px. 2) Acute Weakness flowchart has min-w-[520px] container forcing horizontal scroll on mobile. Swipe hint visible. Flowchart shows 3 columns (History/Examination, Investigations, Neuro Location) with proper text display (no wrapping). Navigation: Login > Dashboard > Children > Approaches > Search 'acetaminophen' or 'weakness'. Test viewport: 390x844 (mobile).
